name: LkCa 15
description:
Its characteristics are given only as the semi-magnitude and orbital period ():
The discovery paper noted with unusual brevity:

With the value for apparent magnitude and the short orbital period, the object is clearly a planet. 
The planet later received the full designation "LkCa 15" as the result of a naming contest, although
the discovery paper never used that name, which has since been adopted for a number of other purposes.
